[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /std/npc/inherit/owned.c

Common functionality for an npc that is owned (ie summoned/controlled by someone else).

Written by Aquilo

Method index

query_owner()
set_owner(mixed)
Set who owns us.
stats()

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
query_owner
object query_owner()

Returns:
the ob pointing to the thing that owns/controls us
set_owner
object set_owner(mixed owner)
Set who owns us.

Parameters:
owner - either player name, player ob, or other living ob
stats
mixed * stats()
